meanings.definition: Plays that are not performed on stage.
meanings.sent1: In the library, students enjoy reading nonplays during their free time.
meanings.sent2: The book club discussed various nonplays written by local authors.
meanings.sent3: The nonplays on the bookshelves seemed to whisper stories of their own.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination turned the nonplays into colorful adventures in her mind.
meanings.sent5: The nonplays lined up neatly on the shelf, waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: Actions or strategies that do not involve participating in a game or performance.
meanings.sent1: His success in the project was due to his clever nonplays behind the scenes.
meanings.sent2: The team's coach praised their innovative nonplays during the match.
meanings.sent3: The nonplays of the team surprised their opponents and led to victory.
meanings.sent4: Her nonplays in negotiations were like a chess master's strategic moves.
meanings.sent5: The CEO's nonplays in business were always one step ahead of the competition.
